data.text: As you climb down from the train, you notice a steady orange hazard light near the door that you haven't seen before. Worried that your only way of reaching ASCENSION might break down, you look for a label to tell you what the light means.

"LOW FUEL". Ah. You sort of expected the train to run on magic or something, but this makes sense. You step back inside and find another control panel, quickly locating a display that tells you how dire the situation is. Past that, you locate the hatch to add more and some schematics explaining what sort of fuel to use.
